sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SARCOCELE, in ſurgery, a ſpurious rupture or hernia, wherein the teſticle is conſiderably tumefied or indurated, like a ſcirrhous, or much enlarged by a fleſhy excreſcence, which is frequently attended with acute pains, ſo as to degenerate at laſt into a cancerous diſpoſition. See Surgery.
